lenders.name: MultiFunding
lenders.loan_because: We understand the importance of access to capital. We work everyday with small business owners and entrepreneurs to secure financing.  Our success should benefit our families, but also those who live in a place where funding is not so plentiful.  Each time we help a client secure financing, we will make a microloan to an entrepreneur through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: We educate small business owners about debt financing options and then work with them to secure the best product for their business.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in pricing at an electric utility.  I love international travel and it reminds me how fortunate I am just to be born in the U.S.

lenders.name: Smedley's  Class
lenders.loan_because: Throughout the two years of being together, Ms Gail Smedley's Aiming High class has grown together as a family. From the beginning of 7th grade, we have learned how fortunate we are to live in relative peace and prosperity and how we are members of a global community. Our class has decided to share some of our blessings by helping aspiring entrepreneurs build a better life for themselves. The 2007-2008 8th grade class is the beginning of a great legacy, which will continue in future years, donating to Kiva with each new 8th grade class.
lenders.occupational_info: Ms Smedley teaches a group of hardworking, dedicated students that have been accepted into the Highly Capable Program for Gifted Learners in Ferndale, WA. We spend half a day together for two years in middle school covering the subjects of Language Arts, Social Studies, and Literature. More importantly, as a result of many deep philosophical discussions, we learn about ourselves and our responsibilities as global citizens.

lenders.name: Heidi Rønne
lenders.loan_because: We all should give microloans, because most of us can afford to.  By helping one woman, you actually give aid to 5 people, her entire family in many cases. By fighting poverty, we also fight terrorism.

lenders.name: Mette

lenders.name: The Hesselberg Family

lenders.name: Raymond

lenders.name: Chris @ Yado.com

I found this site very uplifting.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Telecom, cellphones and fixed phones, solutions for business market in Norway. Not really so much to say about it, but I like it :o)

lenders.occupational_info: I work as a PA & Senior Administrator in the Rail Systems department of a worldwide known company which delivers solutions for the rail and transportation sector. I directly support the Sales Director, as well as the sales team in day-to-day activites.

lenders.name: Rein
lenders.loan_because: It's right.

lenders.name: Sylvia

lenders.name: Rune
lenders.loan_because: I read an article in a norwegian newspaper about Kiva, and I've heard about these microloans from the articles about the Nobel Prize winner, Muhammad Yunus. I wanted to contribute, and I really hope these small loans will help other people create or grow their own  business.
lenders.occupational_info: Guiding airplanes and everything else that fly around safe and efficient to their destination.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kai Ivar
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because:
I have seen with my own eyes what happens to people desperate enough to leave their home country, trying to get to Europe in search of a better life. 

If I can make a contribution to someone so they can move on to develop their skills and stand on their own feet, a small but important change has been made. 
It may not be much, considering the world's many problems. But I am certain that my small contribution makes a lot of difference for this one person in need and for his/her family.

lenders.name: Little Green Wagon
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the power of paying it forward.  Supporting the entrepreneurial spirit empowers a community to remain unique and whole.  

$25 and you can be your own Warren Buffet.

lenders.loan_because: I hope for change.

lenders.loan_because: A little can help a lot!

lenders.name: Oscar

lenders.occupational_info: Teacher

lenders.name: Payton Economics
lenders.loan_because: We are a collection of AP Microeconomics students who attend Payton College Prep High School in Chicago, IL.  We have examined the Nobel Prize winning work of Muhammad Yunus.  Kiva's innovative infrastructure -- which enables thousands to function as bankers to the poor -- provides a powerful extension of Yunus' life's work.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students who strive to move beyond the four walls of our classroom.

lenders.name: Ruben
lenders.occupation: CTO of a Telecom Solution Developer company
lenders.loan_because: I like the direct and concrete approach on where my money is going. Compare this to certain Norwegian aid-organizations where only a small percentage (10% - 40%) is actually going to aid, the rest is spent on "administrative issues".
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is about making communication between people possible with new and cheaper technology.

VoIP is going to make a huge impact on the way people in developing countries will communicate with each other in the future.

lenders.name: Dag Robert
lenders.occupation: Being a little boy, working in kindergarden
lenders.loan_because: My mum and dad has given my weekly allowance to people who need it more than me. I like to help people to get a better life, and give my small contribution.
lenders.occupational_info:
Update: moved to north of Norway, to Hammerfest. Still busy. My favourite toy now is snowscooter. Looking forward to try one when snow comes.

Update: I just celebrated my 2 years birthday. I`ve learned to talk a little bit. Still busy working in kindergarden, which I think is very fun.

Update: Now I`m 1,5 years old. I`ve learned go walk and now the world is open for me :-). I`ve also got my first job going to kindergarden, that`s fun. I enjoy it very much.

Update: Now I`m 9 months old, I`ve just learned to crawl and stand up. Now my parents are more busy keeping things out of my hands.

Original text: Due to that I`m only 4 month`s old my full days work is eating and sleeping for the time beeing.

lenders.name: Philosophy Texas State
lenders.loan_because: We believe we are all sharing the same journey through time and space and we want to empower our fellow travelers.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach philosophy at a State University in Texas

lenders.name: Oivind
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help a little

lenders.name: Tor-Odd
lenders.loan_because: I do hope that I help to make a difference to the people I give a loan

lenders.name: Cybertom
lenders.loan_because:
By making such small amounts available to people in need, i am not only giving these people a chance to give themselves a better life - but also their family and their community. Helping them to build a future in their own environment is the future!

 So instead of eating out tonight, I  invested USD 25,- in someones life, hoping that the people I invest in and believe in, will be able to create a future in their own environment. AND, I recommend everyone else to do the same!

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the fact that I'm not giving to a faceless organization, I'm giving to a person.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best ways to empower our neighbors, giving them opportunities to become economically independent, improve their standard of living, and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities. (Kiva's mission statement)
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant to a broker at AG Edwards (an investment firm). I answer phones and prepare documents for meetings with clients.

lenders.name: Thomas, Marion und Lea
lenders.loan_because: I think that is the right way to help people without take them their own initiative
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a city-hall of a town with 50.000 people. I am a teacher for computers and software for the other comrades in the city-hall.

lenders.name: ContraCostaChristianHS

lenders.occupational_info: We are a Christian School for Christian families.

lenders.name: Kelli (used to be Cozumel)
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped me in life, so I want to pass the help on. I grew up in Mexico and am all too familiar with small business that need a lifeline for the short run. I loan because I can at the moment.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish (Language and Literature) and Women's Studies at a large university. In women's studies I look at the impact tourism has on women's lives - for better or for worse, among other things.

lenders.name: Atle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this concept. Helping people to help themselves makes sense.

lenders.name: Stein

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to build a business and enable help them to make a living for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating software mostly in some way related to the Internet.

lenders.name: Nils Arve
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to help other people

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Folke
lenders.loan_because: I am fascinated by the idea of giving microcredits to somebody by myself.
lenders.occupational_info: As a student I spend a lot of time in university, reading or in front of my computer. There's always something to do.

lenders.name: Bønes Aires Invest
lenders.loan_because:
Because it is nice to help somebody who need funding.
... and if you give a man a fish you feed him for a day, but if you teach him how to fish he will be able to feed him self the rest of his life.

lenders.name: Bjørn
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepeneur myself and I like to see people get an opportunity to start something up and then make it grow into something that can help them, and their surroundings, out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I compose, record and produce music. I then license the non-exclusive use of that music to companies who need music for presentations, videos, film, games, slideshows, websites and other media.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Someone needs it more than me...!

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people and it's not anonymous, because I know who is getting the money.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Its a fantastic  idea to be able to help small businesses/families secure a better life for themselves and their own communities - through micro-loans and a hugh volunteer network.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I admire those who build their business in difficult conditions.

lenders.name: Kristian
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Thuy&Dan
lenders.loan_because: We want to reach out a helping hand to people in need around the world !!!!!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Helping people who want to help themselves works for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people selling their homes and buying homes.

lenders.name: Ratko
Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all need to share our resources equitably.  Without a more balanced distribution of resources - economic, political, social, cultural - peace will be elusive!
lenders.occupational_info: I am working to promote peace at all levels, through consumer education, promoting awareness of social justice issues, and environmental/sustainability education.

lenders.name: Knut
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web based software systems for a consultant company in Norway

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to make a big change with any size contribution.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do....
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep the air we breath and water we drink clean

lenders.name: Microstockgroup.com
lenders.loan_because: It is important.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a entrepreneur I understand the need for capital to get something started.  Kiva provides a great opportunity connecting entrepreneurial spirits around the world.  

Every yearly membership fee that Microstockgroup.com receives will first be sent to Kiva.  Once the Kiva loan has been repaid, the membership fee will then go to support the microstockgroup website.
